SELECT ms.flnm_nm || 'ã€€' || ms.flnm_lnm AS stuName, CASE WHEN #{refType} IN('0','1') THEN espd.sgd_start_datime WHEN #{refType} = '2' THEN trh.TALK_DATIME ELSE NULL END AS sgdStartTime, geas.reply_cnt AS replyCnt FROM guard_event_apply_sts AS geas INNER JOIN mst_stu AS ms ON ms.stu_id = geas.stu_id AND geas.event_id = #{eventId} AND geas.guard_id = #{guardId} AND geas.stu_id = #{stuId} AND geas.reply_sts_div = '1' AND geas.del_flg = 0 AND ms.del_flg = 0 INNER JOIN mst_event AS me ON geas.event_id = me.id AND me.del_flg = 0
LEFT JOIN event_sche_plan_del AS espd ON espd.id = geas.event_sche_del_id AND #{refType} in('0','1') AND espd.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN talk_record_h AS trh ON trh.stu_id = geas.stu_id AND trh.guard_id = geas.guard_id AND trh.event_id = geas.event_id AND trh.talk_apply_sts_div = '0' AND trh.del_flg = 0 AND #{refType} = '2'
